Body:
sim_pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=100.0, regions=[
    (0, 1, 0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
non_uniform_charge_region = sim_pattern.simulate_region(region_dimensions=(
    3, 3), ci_seed=1, column_deviation=1.0)
non_uniform_charge_region = np.round(non_uniform_charge_region, 1)
assert (non_uniform_charge_region == np.array([[101.6, 99.4, 99.5], [101.6,
    99.4, 99.5], [101.6, 99.4, 99.5]])).all()
